job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 120-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Developing cloud-native backends and implementing data processing algorithms using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Review code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
job_details.full_text:
Back-end Principal Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 120-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Developing cloud-native backends and implementing data processing algorithms using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Review code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on back-end development, cloud-native architectures, and data processing algorithms, but it does not mention any specific AI, ML, or Generative AI technologies, models, or frameworks. The core responsibilities described align more with traditional software engineering or data engineering roles rather than specialized AI engineering profiles. Therefore, it is classified as Ambiguous as it does not fit the technical requirements of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Developing cloud-native backends' directly relates to building software applications and services.
The phrase 'implementing data processing algorithms' indicates tasks related to handling and transforming data.
The phrase 'Review code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements' is a core software development activity focused on code quality and maintainability.
job_tasks.phrase: Review code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements
